query: SELECT h.id, h.name, h.organizationId, o.name as orgName FROM horses h LEFT JOIN organizations o ON h.organizationId = o.id LIMIT 10
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 29dBgEd9G6t5VH4.root --database bxoqvfJMBEhE7Cr2hfpnwS --execute SELECT h.id, h.name, h.organizationId, o.name as orgName FROM horses h LEFT JOIN organizations o ON h.organizationId = o.id LIMIT 10
